'''Radiant Spincrystal 77''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Chatter Between Roots]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a gear in a cave behind the Ruin Golem in [[Devantaka Mountain]].
